name: Rake It in
description:
This game was made for the Great Harvest Game Jam. I didn;t have a lot of time to work on it due to college, so I couldn't get a save feature working. All art, sounds, and music were made by me. This was my firs game jam and it was a lot of fun so thank you to the people at Firith Studio for hosting this jam! Sorry for Mac people I could only afford the Windows export for GMS2.

Controls: 

Arrow Keys: Move

Z : Rake

X: Open shop (only usable when at the shop)

Mouse: Make selections

Other Notes:

I developed this game using Game Maker Studio 2. I own a license for GMS1 and didn't know if upgrading would be worth it so I got a trial license for GMS2 not realizing that you can't export an exe using it. I was gonna buy the license for it anyway but not until after the semester because I am not working right now, and I'm trying to conserve my money.  However by the time I found this out I didn't have time to port it to GMS1 so I had to buy the 12 month license which cost me like half of my bank account. Sad times
